alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Bibb; Chilton; Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Autauga, southwestern Chilton, northern Perry, southwestern Bibb and northeastern Dallas Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mertz to near Parnell. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brent, Maplesville, Billingsley, Plecher, Parnell, Paul M Grist State Park, Mertz, Heiberger, Stanton, Valley Creek Junction, Plantersville, Oakmulgee, Sprott, Barrett Creek, Ellards and Dawson Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham.
